comment: color coding is a bit confusing. otherwise great video! thanks

Hey Brian,  Just wanted to give you an update. I have a site up and running. You should probably that to study organic chemistry in the fall because it contains the topics and subtopics in an organized fashion. Good luck.

I am currently working on organic chemistry. I have about 20 or so videos so far but will finish it by this fall. Look up the playlist titled "organic chemistry" on my main page. Let me know if you need me to link you.
Thank you very much. I appreciate your kind words.
